name: Featured Background Image – Free
author: MohammadJafar Khajeh

sections.description:
In some websites if you change the background dynamically then single page of contents will be more beautiful.
For example: In game news websites if you change the background with game cover(Featured image), the page will be more beautiful.

Featured Background Image have some options with them you can create a better background for your posts.

Featured Background Image support any post types in wordpress. So Featured Background Image support WooCommerce, Easy Digital Donwloads and others. Generally Featured Background Image support all post types.

I tried to create simple options for any users to be simple usage.

What is PRO version:

In PRO version you can choose filter and effects for your image. Each filter or effect has options for customize it.
Even you can combine filters and effects to create your interesting effect.
You can buy the PRO version soon.

One more thing about Featured Background Image:

Featured Background Image uses i18n, So you can translate it for your language. I already translate it to persian.

TO DO:

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/featured-background-image directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. When you want to send or edit your posts, You can see Featured Background Image metabox.
